name: HTML
handler: return {id: 'H' + i * 1000 + j + 1,title: game[0],url: group.path + game[1] + '/',img: group.path + game[1] + '/' + (game[2] || group.image),type:'html'}

name: RETRO
handler: return {id: 'R' + i * 1000 + j + 1, title: game[0],url:'/retro/?core=autodetect&rom=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.codetabs.com%2Fv1%2Fproxy%2F%3Fquest%3Ddownload6.mtcontent.rs%2Ffiles%2FNo-Intro%2F' + group.romPath + game[0] + ' ' + game[1][0] + '.zip',img:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/libretro-thumbnails/' + group.imgPath + '/master/Named_Boxarts/' + encodeURIComponent(game[0] + ' ' + game[1][0]) + '.png',type:group.name}
